title: Lmao there's only complaints thread
body:
And all of them are being ignored completely. I think it's better to focus on League Puppets Merch and other useless garbage stuff. Milk it till it's possible...
This game sure is doing good :>

replies.body:
Pretty standard for the gameplay boards.
We are in boy who cried wolf territory now. People have been complaining about dumb shit for the longest time that now when the game's health is actually in a really bad spot, we can't cry wolf.
Never there was such a massive amount of general discontent shown on the forums.

There sure was, remember Dynamic queue m8?

But I don't remember it lasting this long over the same reason. We are closing in to almost a year about complaints about the same reason, dyn queue outrage lasted a year too so this might be a new record if it lasts a few months more.

> [{quoted}](name=nelogis,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=VflfOj78,comment-id=000000010001,timestamp=2018-07-11T12:09:07.022+0000)
>
> There sure was, remember Dynamic queue m8?
> 
> But I don't remember it lasting this long over the same reason. We are closing in to almost a year about complaints about the same reason, dyn queue outrage lasted a year too so this might be a new record if it lasts a few months more.

Dynamic que was just one thing tho, right now the entire game except aram is fucked. Hell they cant even get urf right. Its still "all random" and we cant make urf custom games.
To be fair ARAM is also a shitshow of damage where one ace at the 20 minute mark means game over.
Thats flat out not true. Dynamic queue was not the only thing people complained about at the time

As others have said, that was about one thing.
Right now, the whole fucking game is a borefest

> Never there was such a massive amount of general discontent shown on the forums.

There ***ALWAYS is*** such a massive amount of general discontent shown on this forum.
yeah but not this much on the same topic

It’s literally always on the same topic. People will literally look at hot, and pretty much copy and paste whatever is there and post it again the next day with their own take, and tada, get around the same amount of upvotes. 

Doesn’t make it any more or less popular of an opinion, just literally the same people upvoting the same topic.
You must be *really* new. Like, joined last week new.
how new are you

> [{quoted}](name=Baker of Targon,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=VflfOj78,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2018-07-11T11:55:38.583+0000)
>
> Never there was such a massive amount of general discontent shown on the forums.

Plenty of times.

Hell id say general discontent is the standard for these forums.

> [{quoted}](name=TitanAnteus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=VflfOj78,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-07-11T11:35:39.266+0000)
>
> Pretty standard for the gameplay boards.
> We are in boy who cried wolf territory now. People have been complaining about dumb shit for the longest time that now when the game's health is actually in a really bad spot, we can't cry wolf.

Great parallel

Exactly the thing.

People have said the same arguements over and over again, but expect to have their every whim met every time within seconds.... "or else".

While i dont really have any complaints myself (besides that Yi needs to be reworked hard, and lose his ability to just shred everyone down 1v5 with ease).... i have seen some things that could be interesting.... but i know they CANT be implimented very well.... at least till mid season uodate or end of season.
When has Gameplay been anything but complains.

True, but it used to "X" item is OP nerf it, or "X" is broken get rid of it, or "X" champ just deleted me with no counterplay FIX IT FIX IT FIX IT.  Now its "THE WHOLE GAME IS A STEAMING PILE OF SHIT, I HATE ALL OF IT". The difference isn't exactly subtle, how do you not see the change?

There were a few instances I can recall.

Summoners rift overhaul
Jungle rework (when they added gromp and raptors)
Velkoz on release
Nemesis draft
Kassadin when he was finally gutted XD
Every time an assassin lost their silence
Jhin on release (positive reception but ppl wanted small nerfs, mostly constructive)

Post cinderhulk sejuani nerfs. Ppl praised the stability of the meta and how everything was viable (literally, not "you can try this but it likely won't work")
Oh the irony. See too many threads complaining. Better make a thread to complain about said threads.   {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

> [{quoted}](name=JuanaBarraza,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=VflfOj78,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-07-11T12:26:45.779+0000)
>
> Oh the irony. See too many threads complaining. Better make a thread to complain about said threads.   {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

"History is doomed to repeat itself" - some guy at Taco Bell after shitting the toilet.

Most of the complaint threads are just people venting about something stupid with no actual substance in the post.  It's not surprising most of them get ignored.  Nothing to discuss with those people.

Dude... old forums were so fun </3
I don't like these modern boards, this is not a forum

Its nothing new. People love to complain. 
The only problem - complains kinda starting to look very similar and unified... Its almost like there is actually some problem in league... I just cant really point my finger to what might that thing be...
Could it be that thing that people complain about in 80% of threads atm?
There's a difference between useless complaints and actual constructive criticism, which the majority of the posts in lol na boards are a cesspool of low effort QQ threads
few low effort threads doesn't mean anything....while in the other hand, a lot of them about same "problem"....
Because it's easy to farm upvotes on that topic, that's why they create these threads

Really, cause I see a ton of low effort complaint threads that ain't getting past 10 votes. If they are doing it to upvote farm, they are doing it wrong lols. If you want upvotes you'd better have some content other than, "FIRE GHOSTCRAWLER, discuss". Better off posting in Memes and games if you want to farm votes.
you get upvotes if you write about what people want to hear, sometimes that is  mostly in negative context sometimes  in positive, all with reason

Yet you would expect the same ppl to spam threads for upvotes. Which doesn't seem to be the case.
Many different people, similar threads and point if views
that should mean something ;)
Lmao.

The Boards:  OMG DAMAGE IS SO HIGH RITO PLZ NERF
Also The Boards:  Lets give a bunch of champions damage buffs

The Boards: OMG RITO FIX THIS THE PROBLEM IS SO OBVIOUS
Also The Boards:  Does something that would completely gut a champion or make them busted

proven quite alot in the community patch notes at how bad the boards are when balancing the game and making changes to champions
 https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/VzEqsqnd-community-patch-notes

> only complaints thread

Welcome to your first day of Gameplay Board
